website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, versatile sling that makes an ideal everyday bag for any guy.
pros: Users love that this sling has an ergonomic design and is well-made
It also stands out for having a comfortable strap and being a good size
Lightweight yet can hold plenty of items
We also love that it's designed to hold up to a 15-inch notebook computer
cons: Though most felt this sling was near perfect, a few felt improvements like more pockets and better water resistance were needed

customer_reviews.title: Almost fell in love with this. Almost.
customer_reviews.text: Almost fell in love with this product. Almost. Love everything except for one kind of important deficit. Unfortunately the makers of this back pack sling think the most you want to carry for hydration is a bottle less than 2 1/8 inches in diameter. That basically limits you to a tiny 7.5 oz soda can or something similar in circumference. Forget any respectable water bottle. You’ll have to be content to carry that by hand. Would it have killed them to have a little extra fabric for that sleeve on the side? Granted, I know this is a first world problem, but from an athletic apparel company like Under Armor, this seems like a rather shortsighted decision.
customer_reviews.author: Dave 3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hikes and travel!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of useable pockets and storage space!!! I use the front pockets for battery supplies, reading glasses, pens, grooming kits , several earbuds in recharging cases etc., plus room for nuts/ snacks. My hydration bottle hangs well on the sling webbing which I drink thru a straw while hiking. My 12” IPad , Bose QC35II and a bag of electronic supplies sits well in the padded compartment. I have not even loaded the expandable clothing compartment yet. Best design 👌Under Armour 👍🙏love it!!!😘 The Olive Green priced at $31 is a steal.. love it , love it, love it 💝
customer_reviews.author: George Garest

customer_reviews.title: good quality - as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10yr. old grandson for school. He is bigger (taller and bulkier) than the average 10yr old. It is a perfect fit and he loves it. It is good enough quality, size and style that I think he will be carrying it for a few years to come. The sling style makes it easier on his back and shoulders as well. We are pleased with both the price and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine F. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and nice size!
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger then expected! Had I known it was this big, I might have wanted it to have two straps, not be a sling style. Material of the bag, feels top quality! It is made to only go one way over your right shoulder, which is a bummer because half the time I put it on wrong! I wish it could be worn on either shoulder. Side pocket, that I assume was made for a water bottle is not big enough for any type of water bottle in my opinion. Even though this bag has a few cons, I am still quite satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Bag is sturdy, clips are cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find a sling bag that fits larger laptops, and this one definitely gives you a fair amount of room, The unfortunate thing is the plastic clips are poorly made and the one holding the top and bottom straps together failed after regular use after 2 months. I expected better quality from something with the Under Armour logo on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wearing it over one shoulder is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this bag. However, I find it very uncomfortable to carry it over one shoulder, which I like to do most of the time. It is ok crossbody. I also do not like the uncovered outside pocket. I really do not want to worry about water getting in if it rains. As I just received this, I cannot comment about its durability. It does seem to be well made though.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson and he loves it. Nice and roomy. Just the right size. He puts his lunch box and books and even a coat in it. This is the 2nd one we bought. The last one held up 2 years of school. Could have went another year but he wanted a new color
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use it.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great but if you are carrying any weight in the back back while riding a bike or on a scooter it makes it very difficult. Very uncomfortable and throws your balance off (per my middle school child). Used once and forgot to return.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Leyva

customer_reviews.title: A bang for you money portable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag vase off a review from another customer when they said it waterproof. But I have to test them waters myself but it bigger then I throught but thin and can be expanded with it a plus I could wait to get it n got it and I will be updating this a month from now
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Use it for work
customer_reviews.text: It's my duty bag that I take with me I'm an officer working in Door dint take up much space hard to sling across chest with u have on vest, Military or camping packing u cannot alot with evening knowing
customer_reviews.author: phatkatmeowmeow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son does not like the two strap backpacks and last year we ordered an Under Armour the durability was great but the angle made it hard to fit a lot. This bag gives the room of the standard backpack (plus tons of bonus storage) and the one shoulder strap. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old grandson has been wanting this for 2 years. Bought for Christmas and he loves it! He cleaned out his old one as soon as he opened it. This is actually an amazing thing considering he hasn't cleaned out his backpack since school started. :) Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great sling bag! For stoner line cooks!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's a great sling bag. The expansion feature is nice when you end up needing more room. Wish the supper for it was a little stronger. It has come apart a few time butnhabe been able to fix it. Just wish it had a few more small pocket compartments. Other than that. As a line cook it serves as my daily bag and knife bag. With store compartments for my stuff when I'm done at work.as well as a dedicated pouch for my herbal refreshments like my doob tubes and dab pen as well as lighters and wax. Great for the stoner line cook.
customer_reviews.author: Jkramos88

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great bag. My son has carried it for two yrs and it still looks great. You can make it thin and light or unzip the sides and make more room to carry way more stuff. Works out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kazzee

customer_reviews.title: It's UA, and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag before recent travels. I'm a big fan of Under Armour products so I was pleased to see this bag lived up to my expectations! It has plenty of pockets to store/organize everything needed when traveling! The *worst" part was my wife getting used to a single strap/sling bag, she's used to traditional backpacks. We weren't traveling with the laptop so we can't speak to anything related to that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: I like this sling bag
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are just what I need. Quality seems pretty great. Only issue is the carrying handle is light duty and feels like it will tear at some point. I carry a laptop among other things everyday in this bag, so it's not super-light. The handle probably won't last long. That's not a huge deal to me, so other than that, it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: casper1021ax

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale but well worth the money. My bf loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara m.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. The description was as stated
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. The description was as stated. Wished the waist portion of the strap wasn't as thin and had a zipper pocket like the 1.0 version.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong very durable material I love it
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack of ever and it’s so comfortable I’m disabled so I can literally take you with me anywhere at any given time and that alone gives is a 10 in my book
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Compel Sling 2.0
customer_reviews.text: Decent sling bag easy to carry lightweight. And plenty of room for my crap because I carry too much " stuff "
customer_reviews.author: ohgregc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tween and teen boy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old son for back to school and he said this is his favorite backpack he’s had so far. Parenting win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last April. When it came I was thrilled with it. I trusted the brand and it suited a particular need that I had. It is now 4 months later and the front clasp below the logo came off leaving me with an unsecured pouch/pocket that now can't safely be used. I expected so much better from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Everyday backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great to carry everyday. Perfect to fit a laptop in. Throw it over your shoulder and go.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Has numerous pockets for storage. Light weight and seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son to use for sports, more specifically wrestling and it was waayyy beyond my expectations. This thing has so many pockets and holds so much stuff. Everything is able to be neatly organized so I don't waste time looking so gear. I almost kept it for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product quality. One of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product quality. One of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro GRYSHYN

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find a regular size backpack with a sling strap...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to find this as it was exactly what I was looking for: A backpack with a sling strap. It has a lot of pockets as well which is nice. My only small complaints would be that I wish the zippers were a bit smoother and heftier and that the price was a bit lower. Steep price for the size and material thickness of this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Fredline

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: wasn't a fit for my needs, didn't keep long enough to give a fair an accurate review.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great for our trip we put all of our electronics in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility of this bag! Big enough to handle it all! Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight durable on the go backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight durable backpack. Holds a lot. Multiple pockets. Slips off the shoulder though. You generally will have to hold it so it does not slip. Overall, good quality that you come to expect from the Under Armour brand. 5 star recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I am super hard on backpacks, so I was looking for one that seems durable. This backpack is super well made, double stitching, and good thick material. Great product, and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Single sling
customer_reviews.text: Great bag when you need single sling to throw over one shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sling bag
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than you think. Hold lots of stuff and stays where you put it on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo M

customer_reviews.title: Love the pockets
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it. He’s a fan of sling bags and I have a hard time finding them.
customer_reviews.author: Ly Vee

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: The is a great product from under Armour. Just the right size for when you are traveling and need to carry basic items like water and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Got 2, zipper broke in same spot on both
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, the zipper broke on both in the same exact spot, the first within 10 days and the second in less than 3 weeks. Expected more for the price and from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: samsboo11

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit my CPAP machine plus more for plane carry on. Really liked the one strap sling. Also glad it is waterproof
customer_reviews.author: GramercyPurchaser

customer_reviews.title: Solid sling bag with lots of organization
customer_reviews.text: This thing can hold a ton. Used it as my carry on man purse for a vacation. Perfect for cord, batteries, chargers, iPad Pro, umbrella, jacket, etc etc.
customer_reviews.author: Glockhammer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack. Fits my 15 inch laptop, 3 inch binder, books, pencils, all the goods.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my 5th grade Grandson. It makes a great backpack, he loves it. He really wanted the sling style this time.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it would be too small, but i is the perfect bag. I use it when I travel too.

customer_reviews.title: Buckle Came Off.
customer_reviews.text: Its A Ok Bag. Had It Less Than 3 Days And Front Buckle Came Off

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for my son for school and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: April Byrd

customer_reviews.title: New favorite bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! So many pockets!!! I didn’t realize how much stuff I could fit in this thing! Super tactical!
customer_reviews.author: Ettezzil Renoclaf

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of one shoulder slings. This handles my 15.7ish Toshiba laptop and whatnot I use for projects. I think they could've added a few more compartments though.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great savings! My boy loves the single strap design as he thinks only dorks wear backpacks with both straps lol

customer_reviews.title: Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Needs a clip so you can attach the compel sling to other luggage when traveling

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Plenty of room and comfortable on the shoulder.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: everything bout this bag is great.. the weight is reasonable rain resistant material and has expandable storage if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Good durable backpack

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great product, lots of space, but could improve the strength of the one strap

customer_reviews.title: Would have made more sense as standard backpack
customer_reviews.text: Far too large (and boxy) to wear comfortably as a sling. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: LGQ

customer_reviews.title: For me it’s brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I wanted something compact but with enough pockets to secure everything I need and this bag does it.

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a sling-style backpack
customer_reviews.text: Really like the size and that it will hold several binders

customer_reviews.title: Disney world
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for Disney world, it worked fabulous it's a $59.99 bag and it came with a retail tag. Its huge and fit everything we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Tart

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bookpack
customer_reviews.text: It is not very deep. Has 2 very shallow sections that can hold a laptop each. I want this for a book backpack.
customer_reviews.author: twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Item came used.
customer_reviews.text: Item came used. No tags and this folder and paperwork inside. Disappointed. Looks like a great bag, but I didn’t payed used price for it.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Nice but part of it is already broken.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, unfortunately after less than a month it has already broken. No this piece being broken does not keep you from using it but after paying this much for something it shouldn’t break this fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good bag with more room than you think
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very durable and I like the styling
customer_reviews.author: JASON BROWNING

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I'm pretty rough with my things and this backpack could take a beating.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Way more pockets then I thought. My son loves it

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, saw a friend with it as a carry on and it works great for me on a two day outta Towner!

customer_reviews.title: Overall good size
customer_reviews.text: Decent size bag just wished the strap was a little longer. Overall good size bad for what it is .

customer_reviews.title: Great bag !! Comfortable & quality!

customer_reviews.text: This backpack was a perfect size for my 11yr old. It’s nice that it expands if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best bags I have ever bought

product_meta.title: Under Armour Compel Sling 2.0
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology repels water without sacrificing breathability. Soft-lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15" MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop. Adjustable, padded, HeatGear crossbody strap for total comfort. Water-resistant UA Storm valuables pocket. Front zip organization pocket. Side water bottle pocket. Dimensions When Full: 19"W x 13"L x 6"H. Volume: 1000 Cubic In. / 16.4 L.
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology repels water without sacrificing breathability
Soft-lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15" MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop
Adjustable, padded, HeatGear crossbody strap for total comfort
